content:
There are many pubs in the Cotswolds that serve excellent cider. Here are a few recommendations:

1. The Royal Oak in Tetbury: This pub has a great selection of ciders on offer and is known for its cozy atmosphere and friendly staff. 2. The Old Spot in Dursley: This traditional country pub has won awards for its cider and is a popular spot among locals and visitors alike. 3. The Royal Oak in Prestbury: This charming pub is located in a beautiful village and has a great selection of ciders and other drinks. 4. The Wild Rabbit in Kingham: This stylish pub is known for its artisanal ciders and has a great selection of drinks and food. 5. The Crown and Trumpet in Broadway: This historic pub is located in a picturesque village and has a great selection of local and regional ciders. Keep in mind that the selection of ciders may vary depending on the season and availability. It's always a good idea to check in advance or ask the staff for recommendations. Enjoy!
